EmailTemplate.description: Send when the Case has been created
EmailTemplate.name: Partner assist Case Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCR Case Submitted
Hello,
This is to let you know we have received your email. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and assigned to the Partner Assist queue. Partner Assist team will shortly be picking up this case to address your concern. Thank you for your patience!
Please do not respond to this automatic message.
Warmest regards, NCR Partner Assist Team
NCR Confidential. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St. NW, Atlanta, GA 30308-1007 Â©2020 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. ncr.com NCR respects your privacy.
